meanings.definition: The act of making or altering clothes to fit a particular person.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed learning about tailorings in her sewing class.
meanings.sent2: The tailorings for the wedding party turned out beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The tailorings were so precise that the clothes seemed to dance on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in the tailorings was like painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tailorings transformed the fabric into a work of art.

meanings.definition: The clothes that have been made or altered by a tailor.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his new tailorings to his friends.
meanings.sent2: The tailorings hung neatly in the boutique window.
meanings.sent3: The tailorings seemed to whisper secrets of elegance and style.
meanings.sent4: Her tailorings were like a second skin, perfectly fitting and comfortable.
meanings.sent5: The tailorings exuded sophistication and class.
